summary: All five requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-5) have been implemented in the diff. The backend now includes Aladhan API integration with method 13, the frontend fetches daily and weekly prayer times through the backend proxy, persistent city selection is implemented via localStorage with DEFAULT_LOCATION fallback, and prayer time tracking components are present in HomeTab and RamazanKosesiTab. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were detected.
